ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t feel he was commercializing it, more like defending against accusations. ... From: James Sparks  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I don't feel he was commercializing it, more like defending against
accusations.

-----Original Message-----
From: James Sparks <jchristophersparks@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 2:41 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: (no subject)


>From: James Sparks <jchristophersparks@...>
>
>Try to use the message board for bards, not promoting your guild. So
>one guy has a problem, and you can't please everybody. But try to help
>bards out by tips, tactics and quest hints, not guild promotion. You
>may be a good guild, I don't know, but please try to keep it
>uncommercialized. Thankyou.
>
>For instance, any woodelf bard can give 4 spiderling silks to the guild
>leader in kelethin and get a hand drum. This quest can be done over and
>over and the drums can be sold for about 3-4 gold. Not to shabby for
>newbies.
>
>_________________________________________________________
>Do You Yahoo!?
>Get your free @... address at http://mail.yahoo.com
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Have you visited the new ONElist home page lately?
>http://www.ONElist.com
>ONElist: The Leading e-mail list and community service on the Internet!
>
